    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize the structures with the imageViews

      • configure

        public void configure(Client client,
                      PaymentMessage paymentMessage,
                      java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.Image> images)
        Method that needs to be called after the controller is instantiated (you can choose between two different configure methods). Manages everything to show
        Parameters:
        client - reference to the Client instance
        paymentMessage - paymentMessage to show
        images - List of Images to show

      • configure

        public void configure(Client client,
                      PaymentMessage paymentMessage,
                      java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.Image> images,
                      PlayerBoardMessage playerBoardMessage,
                      javafx.scene.Group ammoGroup,
                      boolean anyColor)
        Method that needs to be called after the controller is instantiated (you can choose between two different configure methods). This method has to be called if the payment involves a payment with the possibility to pay with an ammo of any color.
        Parameters:
        client - reference to the Client instance
        paymentMessage - paymentMessage to show
        images - List of Images to show
        playerBoardMessage - playerBoardMessage of the player
        ammoGroup - Group with the Nodes representing the ammo of the player
        anyColor - true if the player can pay with an ammo of any color, false if he can't

      • showSelection

        public void showSelection(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Sets an effect to the ImageView when a specific mouseEvent is caught (onMouseEntered)
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - mouseEvent caught

      • disableEffect

        public void disableEffect(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Disables the effect to the ImageView when a specific mouseEvent is caught (onMouseExited)
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - mouseEvent caught

      • handleSelection

        public void handleSelection(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Handles the selection of a card (ImageView with onMouseClicked listener)
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - mouseEvent caught

      • payWithAmmo

        public void payWithAmmo()
        Handles the pay with ammo button. If anyColor is true changes the scene to a SelectAmmoColorScreen, if false sends a pay message with index -1.

      • sendPayMessage

        public void sendPayMessage(int selection)
        Sends a paymentSelection message
        Parameters:
        selection - index of the selection

      • closeWindow

        public void closeWindow()
        Closes the stage with the PaymentScreen
